compounddef.title: Mediastreamer2's high level APIs
compounddef.innergroup: Audio streaming API - Create and run VoIP audio streams.
Audio conferencing API - Easily create conferences.
Video streaming API - Create and run video streams.
Ring playing API - Play ring files.

detaileddescription.para: The high level apis are designed to provide an easy way to create audio or video processing graphs for VoIP.
